data.name: Recall: Empty Wishes
data.detailed_description:
If you knew that your wish would never come true, what pushed you to keep on going?





《Recall: Empty wishes》 is a story-driven game based in Taiwan.
The story centers around the desires and memories shared by a brother-sister pair.


Why did Tommy Lin, a smart and considerate boy, suddenly disappear?
Pick up the toy handset and let it guide you back in time and uncover the truth...


▴The five main characters(left to right): Phoebe(Yonny's friend), Mocky(Tommy's friend), Tommy, Eartha(Tommy and Yonny’s mother) and Yonny(Tommy's sister).

Follow Yonny and Phoebe as they relive the memories of five key players surrounding Tommy’s disappearance. Each chapter delves into the memories of one character, revealing the character’s deepest wishes and secrets. By investigating and collecting items from 2D side-scrolling scenes, you will piece together the truth regarding Tommy’s disappearance.


▴Interact with the past images.


▴《The gallery of empty wishes》


▴The mysterious telephone booth in the gallery.


  • Based on the culture of Taiwanese students in the 2010s.
  • Combines elements from fantasy, mystery, and horror genres.
  • Non-linear storytelling.
  • Alternate point of view narration: multiple character perspectives
  • Immerse yourself in the mystery.

  • 2D side-scrolling playing.
  • Pixel-art characters and scenes.
  • Multiple language support. (Including Chinese, English and Japanese)

data.short_description: Ever since Tommy disappeared, Yonny, his sister, has been trying to locate him. By way of a toy handset once shared with Tommy, Yonny and her friend gained access to a world constructed from past memories, along with its inhabitants’ most private thoughts and the truth of Tommy’s disappearance...
